Articles.Content:
So this happens to me:

1) I reply to a thread

2) I reply again to the same thread on a different topic/issue

3) It edits my first post to combine the two

How can I stop this from happening?
As far as I know the forum only merges two posts if they are made within a certain time. Don't know how long but next time you might want to wait a few minutes before posting your second reply.

This is controlled by the vBulletin double post options to prevent multi-post spamming, and is set to 30 minutes.

So to avoid it, wait 30 minutes.
